mapper.select:
select
from Project where ProjectName LIKE '%${param1}%' AND ProjectMgr_WorkID = #{param2}

select
from Project where (IsFinish != 1 OR IsFinish IS NULL) AND ProjectStartDateTime IS NOT NULL AND ProjectStartDateTime > N'2017-2-1' AND (ProjectName LIKE '%${param1}%')
mapper.update:
